bibl.title: A New Demotic Private Letter from Hermopolis.
bibl.note: Private letter (Ptolemaic period), now in the al-Ashmunein magazine (Inv. No. 1455), found in the necropolis of Tuna al-Gebel during excavations by the Cairo University mission. - Description. - General commentary. - P. 223: Appendix. A list of Demotic letters written on papyri and published since 2006. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Mahmoud Ebeid, A New Demotic Private Letter from Hermopolis.

Private letter (Ptolemaic period), now in the al-Ashmunein magazine (Inv. No. 1455), found in the necropolis of Tuna al-Gebel during excavations by the Cairo University mission. - Description. - General commentary. - P. 223: Appendix. A list of Demotic letters written on papyri and published since 2006. - Avec résumé en anglais.
